name: XIV-Hunt β
description: XIV-Hunt client (add-on) for Final Fantasy XIV for tracking hunts and FATEs. Also has the ability to macro performance.
notes:
You MUST install this program into the same prefix as "FINAL FANTASY XIV - A Realm Reborn"
This Program does not function when installed to its own prefix, and must share the same prefix as the game (default "/home/$USER/Games/final-fantasy-xiv-a-realm-reborn/")
content:
files:
- Setup: https://www.dropbox.com/s/19nbb1ev7tna9p4/XIVHunt.zip?dl=1
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/users/$USER/AppData/Local/XIVHunt/XIV-Hunt.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    app: mscoree
    description: Installing Libraries...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_47
    description: Installing Libraries...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: dotnet462
    description: Installing .NET 4.6.2
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: win7
    arch: win64
    description: Changing to Windows 7
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    description: "Installing XIV-Hunt \u03B2"
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/users/$USER/AppData/Local/XIVHunt/
    file: Setup
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
  version: ge-protonified-4.10-x86_64
